scripts.start: <%= scriptRunCommand %> build:style && tsc && concurrently -k -r "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "<%= scriptRunCommand %> watch:style" "wds"
scripts.build: <%= scriptRunCommand %> build:style && tsc && <%= scriptRunCommand %> analyze -- --exclude dist
scripts.prepublish: <%= scriptRunCommand %> build:style && tsc && <%= scriptRunCommand %> analyze -- --exclude dist
